name: webdriver.js_vanilla
description: This example project can be extended and used by the end user. It is based on Webdriver.js/Selenium with Node.js. Simply use 'npm i' to install the dependencies and run the test using 'npm test'. The test code is written in example.spec.js inside the ./tests dir. Please go throught the readme.md present in the repository for more details.
author: Ankit Kathal
